title: How to Build an Invention Machine — 6 Lessons That Powered Amazon’s Success
excerpt: Former Amazon execs Colin Bryar and Bill Carr helped build the "invention machine" that enabled the company to successfully launch everything from AWS to the Kindle. Here, they share granular advice and concrete takeaways for startups looking to alter their own trajectories.
